title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Web Conference-Based Projects for Strengthening Online Collaboration Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to use basic digital tools and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can perform role allocation and task coordination among team members with over 80% accuracy using web conferencing tools
Learners can resolve conflict situations arising during online collaboration using at least three strategies
Students can balanced develop four collaboration competencies (operational, interactive, managerial, and design-oriented) within the project period
Learners achieve at least 3 out of 4 points in designing web conferencing-based collaboration processes in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
